full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
EZ 899-240030 Pacific Forestry Centre Greenhouse Upgrade

#### Reference Number
WS 4087614237-Doc 4087694819

#### Solicitation Number
WS 4087614237

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to submit a bid for the Pacific Forestry Centre Greenhouse Upgrade project located in Victoria, BC. The project involves the removal and replacement of the shading system, including operators and controls, and 16 evaporative chillers.

### Project Details

* Project Location: Pacific Forestry Centre (PFC), 506 West Burnside Road, Victoria, BC
* Service Description: Non-residential building construction services, industrial and warehouse construction services, commercial and office building construction services, specialized public building construction services, and industrial plant construction services

### Contract Details

* Contract Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Contract Duration: 31 August 2023

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 27 July 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 18 July 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: 31 August 2023

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

* Mr. Ken Ngan
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Tel: [Not available]
* Email: [Ken.Ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Ken.Ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

A formal invitation to bid (ITB) can be accessed through the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16808782?extsite=MTY4MDg3ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16808782?extsite=MTY4MDg3ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

 Failure to comply with the requirements and conditions set out in the ITB may result in the bid being rejected. It is the responsibility of the bidder to familiarize themselves with the ITB and to ensure that their bid is submitted in accordance with the requirements.
